title: Aldorlea Tales: 3 Stars of Destiny [FINAL] 2013 (PC) Foxy Games
description:
Game Description:
******************
An evil god has made a discovery. Now his attention is turned onto three unaware youths who between them hold an unusual energy.

Yet he is hindered - unable to act directly in their mortal world.
In an attempt to twist the odds, he sets a deadly trap - what will happen?
Is the gathering of 3 stars a simple matter of coincidence or is it... fate?

Fight monsters, explore, complete quests, rescue people in need and explore a fantasy medieval world.

"Aldorlea Tales: 3 Stars of Destiny" is packed with more than 50 quests, 60 hours of game play and so many places to visit: enchanting woods, soaked swamps, glittering lands of snow, charming valleys and so much more!

Game Features:
***************
* Adventure full of humor and wit for all the family!
* Choose between 3 modes of difficulty (easy, normal, hard) and select your monster encounter rate!
* You can match your gaming experience to the level you wish to play!
* Meet 10 characters and help them develop skills and friendship as they fight alongside each other!
* Unlock and/or download amazing Goodies! You can even play the Goddess Yveen in person!
* Customize your characters by picking their stat boosts!
* Visit a huge world for exploration with the chances given to go back to previously visited areas!
* Find relics, artifacts, secret rooms and hidden chests that all are reachable - no teaser chests!

Game Info
***********
PreCracked - Just Install and Play
Cracked by: TAC-CM (Thanks!)
RePacked by: Foxy Games (wishing you happy holidays and marry christmas)
Released: December 2013
Size: 69 Mb
Platform: PC / Windows
Genre(s): RPG / Adventure

Instructions:
**************
1.Download - 2.Install - 3.Play and Have Fun - 4.Keep Seeding!
